application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 22/02384/HOU (Erection of mansard roof extension with 1no front, 1no rear and 1no side dormer above existing garage including new external access stair to create home office)
decision_conditions: A brief Fire Strategy has been submitted but this does not include a Statement of Competence. The strategy does not include all of the relevant details to satisfy policy D12 of the London Plan (2021) and only includes limited/generic basic information with insufficient detail or plans, specific to the site/development. It therefore does not demonstrate that the development would be safe for its lifetime and, as such, this condition cannot be discharged.
